translation.Mais do que um produto, desenvolvemos so: More than just a product, we develop solutions for your business through digital transformation and passion for what we do.
translation.A Comp Júnior é uma empresa sem fins luc: Comp Júnior is a non-profit company that has been operating in the technology market for over 20 years in Lavras and the surrounding region, providing web, mobile, and multi-platform development services.
translation.A Comp Júnior também faz parte do Movime: Comp Júnior is also part of the Junior Enterprise Movement and aims to welcome and develop its members, offering the first professional opportunity and contact with the job market, its methodologies, and structures.
translation.Formar profissionais completos, através: To form complete professionals through BUSINESS EXPERIENCE and digital transformation projects that DEVELOP MEMBERS and IMPACT our SOCIETY.
translation.Alguns dos projetos que já fizemos: Some of the projects we've done
translation.Temos uma equipe pronta para conversar c: We have a team ready to talk to you and clarify any doubts about our company, our services, and processes.
translation.Nos conte um pouco sobre seu projeto: Tell us a little about your project
translation.Por favor, corrija os erros no formulári: Please correct the errors in the form.
translation.Conheça mais sobre a Comp Júnior e sobre: Learn more about Comp Júnior and what a junior enterprise is
translation.Uma Empresa Júnior (EJ) é uma organizaçã: A Junior Enterprise (JE) is an organization composed exclusively of undergraduate students who operate like a real company, developing projects and competing in the traditional market. However, unlike traditional companies, a JE is non-profit. The money generated by projects is reinvested into the company and its members, providing training, access to learning materials, and participation in Junior Enterprise Movement (JEM) events.
translation.Fundada em 11 de agosto de 1999, a Comp: Founded on August 11, 1999, Comp Júnior is a Junior Enterprise of the Federal University of Lavras (UFLA), composed of students from Computer Science, Information Systems, and Control and Automation Engineering courses. Comp Júnior develops various solutions, including web design consultancy, online and mobile system development, training in technology tools, interface design, and marketing consultancy. Currently, Comp Júnior has 48 members from various UFLA courses and is regionally recognized for its quality services and strategic partnerships.
translation.Formar profissionais completos, através: To form complete professionals through business experience and digital transformation projects, developing technical and behavioral skills, boosting the personal and professional growth of our members, and positively impacting society. By 2025, to be a reference JE in the tech niche, with presence throughout the national territory, through the excellence of our services, being recognized as the path for those who wish to stand out within the university and in the job market.
translation.Nós vamos além, colocamos a mão na massa: We go beyond, we get hands-on! We don't settle and always seek proactivity, doing everything necessary to fulfill what we promise. We believe it is essential to clearly express our difficulties and failures, so we seek feedback so that we can evolve together in a collaborative environment. We awaken the inherent potential of each member through the continuous development of our soft and hard skills, always available to assist in the evolution of these abilities. We are proud to be Comp, we carry a legacy, and we know the opportunity it is to be part of this team, working every day to improve and live up to the name we represent.
translation.No mundo digital de hoje, uma presença o: In today's digital world, a strong online presence is essential for the success of any business. At Comp Júnior, we offer specialized services in developing static web pages designed to provide an effective and professional online presence for your company.
translation.Nossas páginas web estáticas são cuidado: Our static web pages are carefully developed to offer a responsive layout, perfectly adapting to different screen sizes, from desktops to mobile devices. Every detail is considered to ensure a consistent and attractive user experience on any device.
translation.Desde o design inicial até a implementaç: From the initial design to the final implementation, our team of web development experts works closely with you to understand your specific needs and objectives. Our goal is to create a solution that not only meets but exceeds your expectations, offering an online presence that highlights your brand and effectively conveys your message.
translation.Ao escolher nossos serviços de desenvolv: By choosing our static website development services, you can be confident that you are receiving a high-quality solution, developed with the latest industry practices and technologies. We are committed to creating websites that not only visually impress but also drive user engagement and generate tangible results for your business.
translation.Seja para lançar um novo produto, promov: Whether launching a new product, promoting your services, or simply sharing important information, our static web pages are the ideal choice for companies seeking an effective and professional online presence. Contact us today to find out how we can help take your business to the next level on the internet. At Comp Júnior, we're here to turn your ideas into digital reality.
translation.Agilidade e Eficiência para seu Negócio: Agility and Efficiency for your Business
translation.Em um cenário empresarial em constante e: In a constantly evolving business landscape, the agility and effectiveness of dynamic systems are crucial to driving success and competitiveness. At Comp Júnior, we offer specialized solutions in dynamic systems, designed to meet the specific needs of your business and deliver exceptional results.
translation.Nossos sistemas web dinâmicos são constr: Our dynamic web systems are built with a central focus on efficient management, robust business logic, and agile development. Each solution is carefully designed to ensure that the implementation is highly effective and able to meet all operational and strategic demands of your company.
translation.Desde websites dinâmicos até sistemas de: From dynamic websites to complex management systems, our approach aims not only to meet but exceed the expectations of our clients. Our experienced team works closely with you to understand the nuances of your business and develop customized solutions that drive efficiency, promote innovation, and stimulate growth.
translation.Ao escolher os nossos serviços de sistem: By choosing our dynamic systems services, you can expect not only flawless technical implementation but also a partner committed to your long-term success. We are here to help you achieve your business goals by providing dynamic, scalable software solutions that are fully adaptable to the ever-changing needs of your business.
translation.Entre em contato conosco hoje mesmo para: Contact us today to discover how our dynamic systems services can transform your company and drive your growth. At Comp Júnior, we're ready to make your vision a reality.
translation.Na era digital, os aplicativos móveis se: In today's digital era, mobile applications have become an indispensable part of our lives, offering personalized functionalities directly on our smartphones and tablets. At Comp Júnior, we offer specialized services in the development of tailor-made mobile applications to meet the specific needs of our clients.
translation.Nossos serviços abrangem todas as etapas: Our services cover all stages of the mobile application development process, from initial consulting to launch and ongoing support. We work closely with our clients to understand their goals and objectives, ensuring that the final application meets their expectations and market demands.
translation.Nossa equipe de designers e desenvolvedo: Our team of highly skilled designers and developers works to create visually appealing, highly functional applications that are compatible with a variety of devices and operating systems. We conduct rigorous testing at every stage of development to ensure the application is bug-free and delivers a seamless user experience.
translation.Acreditamos que os aplicativos móveis of: We believe that mobile applications offer a range of advantages, including accessibility, customization, and user engagement. With the ability to access information and services anywhere, anytime, mobile apps provide convenience and practicality to users. Additionally, the ability to integrate features like push notifications and geolocation allows for a highly personalized and relevant experience.
translation.Leve sua ideia para o próximo nível com: Take your idea to the next level with Comp Júnior's expertise in mobile application development. We are committed to providing tailor-made solutions that drive the success of your business in the ever-evolving mobile world.
translation.No mundo empresarial atual, a análise de: In today's business world, data analysis plays a fundamental role in making intelligent and strategic decisions. This process involves examining data sets to discover patterns, trends, and valuable insights that can drive a company's growth and success.
translation.Na Comp Júnior, oferecemos serviços espe: At Comp Júnior, we offer specialized services in data analysis, providing companies with the tools and knowledge necessary to extract the maximum value from their data. Our goal is to turn raw data into actionable insights, enabling our clients to make informed and data-driven decisions.
translation.Começamos o processo de análise de dados: We start the data analysis process by collecting information from various sources, from internal databases to external data. We then organize and prepare this data for analysis, ensuring that it is ready to be examined effectively.
translation.Utilizando técnicas avançadas de análise: Using advanced techniques in statistical analysis and data visualization, we explore data sets to uncover hidden patterns, trends, and insights. These analyses help identify growth opportunities, understand customer behavior, and optimize operational processes.
translation.Com base nos insights obtidos através da: Based on the insights gained through data analysis, we assist our clients in making strategic and informed decisions. This may involve identifying new markets, optimizing marketing campaigns, or improving operational efficiency.
translation.Os benefícios da análise de dados são in: The benefits of data analysis are numerous. It enables decision-making based on concrete evidence, reducing uncertainty and minimizing the risk of error. Moreover, companies that effectively utilize data analysis have a significant competitive advantage as they can quickly adapt to market changes and anticipate customer needs.
translation.Na Comp Júnior, estamos comprometidos em: At Comp Júnior, we are committed to helping our clients make the most of their data potential. Our team is ready to assist you in turning your data into successful strategies. Contact us today to hire our service!
translation.A SE7I, Semana de Tecnologia da Informaç: The SE7I, Information Technology Week - Federal University of Lavras, was heading into its fourth edition. It is an event that brings together major figures in technology to lecture to members of the community. In 2020, the need for global reorganization affected everyone, including SE7I, which had to adapt its lectures and workshops to a remote format. To face this challenge, Comp Júnior developed an event organization system that allowed community members to explore available lectures, register, and, at the end of the event, receive their certificates.
translation.A Jurídica Júnior, empresa júnior de Dir: 'Jurídica Júnior', the law junior company of the Federal University of Lavras, formed by undergraduate students, operates by providing services such as: contract drafting, legal consulting, legal opinions, articles of association, internal regulations, administrative appeals, trademark registration, and terms of use. The company had difficulties in promoting its service portfolio and establishing a prominent digital presence. To address this, we created a website with a modern and intuitive design. There, we present the company's history, the services offered, partners, testimonials, and the organizational structure of the company.
translation.O Lar Esperança e Vida é uma entidade ci: 'Lar Esperança e Vida' is a private civil entity, non-profit, dedicated to providing support to people undergoing cancer treatment, who face difficulties due to high costs and the disease. To clarify its mission and facilitate the donation process, we have developed a clear and simple Landing Page. In it, we highlight the institution's purposes, mission, vision, and values, as well as the services offered, ways to contribute, and how to contact the entity. This initiative has significantly improved the digital visibility of 'Lar Esperança e Vida', avoiding confusion in the community and making support more accessible to those who need it most.
